content: **pattern notes** scarf is worked flat from end to end flower and leaf fringe is worked directly onto the scarf additional flowers are made separately and sewn onto the scarf scarf as appliques **finished measurements ** width 9¾ length 72 not including fringe **gauge ** 17 sts x 13 row = 4 in blossom stitch patt save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns cotton sprout® dk 100% cotton 3 5oz/100g 230yds/210m mc 1149-16 aqua 4 balls cc1 1149-03 magenta 1 ball cc2 1149-05 bright pink 1 ball cc3 1149-09 leaf 1 ball **hooks & notions ** us size 7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle sewing needle thread to match mc
